item.title: [Delta] Getting it online - 95% Complete Need 5% From You!
item.dc:creator: @c_o_l_d c o l d
item.description:
@c_o_l_d wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:8, topic:395589”]Oh, sorry for that, search .no-ip in the search in folder section. if no results then search 127.0.0.1, 0.0.0.0, or localhost.
When you find a result click it and do CTRL + F and search whatever you typed to find the result. Then, x it, and do it to your other thing (client or source), so if you just did source, do client. Give it to your friends, and change your no-ip in YOUR comp back to 127.0.0.1. Do the same to client/source. Now, you have to run your source and run your client, but everyone else can just run the client to connect.

Np,
Arham[/quote]

Thanks for that, going to try it out now.

Read full topic
item.source: [Delta] Getting it online - 95% Complete Need 5% From You!

item.title: [Delta] Getting it online - 95% Complete Need 5% From You!
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

Oh, sorry for that, search .no-ip in the search in folder section. if no results then search 127.0.0.1, 0.0.0.0, or localhost.
When you find a result click it and do CTRL + F and search whatever you typed to find the result. Then, x it, and do it to your other thing (client or source), so if you just did source, do client. Give it to your friends, and change your no-ip in YOUR comp back to 127.0.0.1. Do the same to client/source. Now, you have to run your source and run your client, but everyone else can just run the client to connect.

Np,
Arham

Read full topic
item.source: [Delta] Getting it online - 95% Complete Need 5% From You!

item.title: [Delta] Getting it online - 95% Complete Need 5% From You!
item.dc:creator: @c_o_l_d c o l d
item.description:
@c_o_l_d wrote:

Goal:
-To get my server online so others can join.

Progress:
-Downloaded JDK
-Downloaded Winrar
-Found base client and source [Delta] 317
-Downloaded Utorrent
-Downloaded No-IP Duc, with No-IP account & host
-Edited Bases to my liking

Steps to get server online (in this order):
-Open Utorrent and select the port 43594 (portforward)
-Open No-IP Duc and select my host
As of this step my server reads online on all status checkers
-Open Runserver File in “Server” Folder (windows batch file)
My server status reads online on Moparscapes status list BUT others still cannot join***

I have gone into the “Server” Folder and opened client.java and done this:

[code=cpp]public int GetWorld(int PlayerID) {
String Server = PlayerHandler.players[PlayerID].playerServer;

	if (Server.equals("bronzerealityv1.zapto.org") || Server.equals("bronzerealityv1.zapto.org")) {
		return 1;
	} else if (Server.equals("bronzerealityv1.zapto.org")) {
		return 2;
	} else {
		println_debug("Invalid Server: " + Server);
		return 1; // 0; friendlist fix-bakatool
	}
}[/code]

bronzerealityv1.zapto.org is my No-IP Host that I have selected in my DUC.*

playerServer = inStream.readString(); } catch (Exception e) { playerServer = "bronzerealityv1.zapto.org"; }
This is another change I’ve made in my client.java

Please tell me if theres anything else I should be doing to allow others to join? (is there something client sided?)

Also what files do I need to have available in the download package of my server?

Read full topic
item.source: [Delta] Getting it online - 95% Complete Need 5% From You!
